definition[0]: to search through a lot of documents, lists etc in order to find out information
example[0]: Iâ€™ll have to trawl through all my lecture notes again.
example[1]: She spent the morning in the library, trawling for information for her project.
definition[1]: to fish by pulling a special wide net behind a boat
definition[2]: an act of searching through a lot of documents, lists etc in order to find something
definition[3]: a wide net that is pulled along the bottom of the sea to catch fish
